Name: Peppermint Vanilla Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: An intriguing combination for folk who want their Daiquiris served 'fresh'.
History: Discovered in 2005 at Bellini, Auckland, New Zealand.
Nutrition: One serving of Peppermint Vanilla Daiquiri contains 189 calories
